lines.value: A brig is a structure biggit tae span a gorge, glen, gate, railwey track, river, body o watter, or ony ither pheesical obstacle. Designs o brigs will vary dependin on the function o the brig an the naitur o the terrain whaur the brig is tae be biggit.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Palestine;, , ) is a conventional name uised, amang others, tae describe a geographic region atween the Mediterranean Sea an the Jordan River, an various adjoinin lands.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The name "Palestine" is the cognate o an ancient wird meanin "Philistines" or "Land o the Philistines". In keepin wi the Greek cultur o the day, it haes an aa been suggestit that it mey an aa be a play on the wird Παλαιστής Palaistes (Greek for wrestler) an a reference tae Jacob, later cawed Israel, the foonder o the ancient Israeli naition. The earliest kent mention is thought tae be in Ancient Egyptian texts o the temple at Medinet Habu which record a fowk cawed the P-r-s-t (conventionally Peleset) amang the Sea Peoples who invadit Egypt in Ramesses III's reign. The Ebreu name Peleshet ( Pəléshseth)- uisually translatit as Philistia in Inglis, is uised in the Bible tae denote the soothren coastal region that wis inhabitit bi the Philistines tae the wast o the ancient Kinrick o Judah.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Loch Lomond (Scot Gaelic: Loch Laomainn), is a freshwater Scots loch, lyin on the Hieland Bundary Faut. It is the lairgest loch in Great Breetain, bi surface aurie, an contains mony islands, includin Inchmurrin, the lairgest fresh water island in the Breetish Isles, awthou the loch itsel is droicht bi mony Erse lochs. It is a popular leisure destination an is featurt in sang.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Nizhny Novgorod Oblast (, Nizhegorodskaya oblast) is a federal subject o Roushie (an oblast). Its admeenistrative center is the ceety o Nizhny Novgorod. Population: 3,310,597 (2010 Census). The oblast is crossed bi the Volga River. Apairt frae Nizhny Novgorod's metropolitan aurie, the biggest ceety is Arzamas. Near the toun o Sarov thare is the lairgest an the maist famous convent in Roushie, established bi Saunt Seraphim o Sarov - Diveevo convent. Makaryev Monastery opposite the toun o Lyskovo uisit tae be location o the lairgest fair in Eastren Europe. Ither historic touns include Gorodets an Balakhna, locatit on the Volga tae the north frae Nizhny Novgorod.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The oblast covers an aurie o, which is approximately equal tae the entire aurie o the Benelux kintras. Agricultural land occupees 41% o this aurie; forests, 48%, lakes an rivers, 2%; an ither lands, 9%. Nizhny Novgorod Oblast borders Kostroma Oblast (N), Kirov Oblast (NE), the Mari El Republic (E), Chuvashie (E), the Mordovie (S), Ryazan Oblast (SW), Vladimir Oblast (W), an Ivanovo Oblast (NW).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Nizhny Novgorod Oblast is no rich in naitural resoorces, which are, maistly, limitit tae commercial deposits o saund (includin titanium-zirconium sands), cley, gypsum, peat, mineral saut, an timmer.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The unique airchitectural construction—the steel lattice hyperboloid touer biggit bi the Great Roushie ingineer an scientist Vladimir Grigorievich Shukhov in 1929—is locatit near the toun o Dzerzhinsk on the left bank o the Oka River.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Population: Accordin tae the 2010 Census, ethnic Roushies at 3,109,661 made up 95.1% o the oblast's population. Ither ethnic groups includit Tatars (44,103, or 1.4%), Mordva (19,138, or 0.6%), Ukrainians (17,657, or 0.5%), an various smawer groups, each accoontin for less nor 0.5% o the oblast's tot population. Additionally, 42,349 fowk wur registered frae admeenistrative databases, an coud no declare an ethnicity. It is estimatit that the proportion o ethnicities in this group is the same as that o the declared group. Accordin tae the Federal Migration Service, 20,450 foreign ceetizens wur registered in the oblast in 2006. The actual nummer o foreigners residin in the oblast as o 1 Juin 2006 wis estimatit tae be ower 22,000.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The oblast ranks seivent in Roushie in industrial output, while the processin industry predominates in the local economy. Mair than 650 industrial companies employ nearly 700,000 fowk, or 62% o the wirkforce involvit in material production. Industry generates 83% o the regional GDP an maks 89% o aw material expenditures. The leadin sectors are ingineerin an metalwirkin, follaed bi the chemical an petrochemical industries an the forestry, firthwirkin, an paper industries. The first three sectors accoont for aboot 75% o aw industrial production. The oblast haes tradeetionally been attractive tae investors. In 2002, Moody's ratin agency confirmit a Caa1rating based on the region's lang-term foreign currency liabilities. The region maintains tred relations wi mony kintras an haes an export surplus. The lairgest volume o exports goes tae Ukraine, Belaroushie, Swisserland, Kazakhstan, Belgium, an Fraunce. Imports come mainly frae Ukraine, Germany, Belaroushie, Kazakhstan, Austrick, Netherlands, Cheenae, an the Unitit States. The stock mercat infrastructur is quite well developit in Nizhny Novgorod, an the exchange business is expandin. Companies an organisations registered in the region include 1153 jynt-stock companies, 63 investment institutions, 34 commercial banks, 35 insurance companies, 1 voucher investment fund, 1 investment fund, 17 nongovernmental pension funds, 2 associations o professional stock mercat dealers, an 3 exchynges (stock, currency, an agricultural). The oblast is notit for haein relatively heichlie developit mercat relations. The day, the region needs serious pairtners interestit in equitable, lang-term, mutually beneficial pairtnerships. Thare are 650+ industrial companies in the region, maist o them engagit in the follaein sectors:

lines.value: Bykovo () is an urban locality (an urban-teep dounset) in Ramensky Destrict o Moscow Oblast, locatit sootheast o Moscow. Population: It wis foondit in 1861–1862 upon construction o the Moscow-Ryazan railwey, replacin the umwhile veelage tae the sooth. Urban-type settlement status wis grantit tae it in 1962. Bykovo is a hame (an a place o birth) for Pavel Chukhrai, Vladimir Sorokin, an Nikolay Rastorguyev. Bykovo Airport an an aircraft repairment facility are locatit here.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Kom Isfaht is a toun in the Upper Egyptian Asyut Govrenorate. It is locatit on the wast bank o the Nile. It wis a Roman veelage (Apollonopolites Heptakomias).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Kom Isfaht is a locality o Nahieh, situatit 3 oors distance frae Abu Tig, in the destrict o Abu Tig, in the province o Asyut. It haes a population o 3,719 inhabitants, wi nae dependencies. References elsewhaur are tae the kirk o St George in Kom Isfaht an tae the fact that its name in Roman Egyp wis Apollinopolis Heptakomia in the nome, or province, o Apollinopolites Parvus. The records o a Strategos, or general, whose name wis Apollonius, o Heptakomia hae been preservit. There are a number o letters tae Apollonius frae his mither, Eudaimonis, an his wife, Aline, when Egyp wis awa campaignin against the Jews in the great revolt o the Jewish Diaspora in Cyrene, Egyp, an Mesopotamie against the Romans an the local populations in 116 an 117 AD. Eudaimonis wis vera worriet aboot Apollonius’ safety, but he seems tae hae returned unhairmit acause they haed his application for twa months’ leave tae sort oot his affairs, efter the end o the revolt, Aline set up an altar tae the Dioscuri, Castor an Pollux, in Thanksgivin. There records o a monastery near Kom Isfaht an aw, the monastery o Apa Apollo at Baouit. Ref:Dictionnaire Geographique de l’Egypte of 1899 records her Kom Esfaht
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Ciénega de Flores is a ceety an surroondin municipality located in Nuevo Leon, Mexico near Monterrey.

lines.value: Ciénega de Flores is recognizit bi its famous machacado (dry meat) fuid, which is ane o the traditional fuids in Nuevo Leon.

lines.value: Accordin tae the INEGI 2005 census Ciénega de Flores haed a population o 14,268, which 5,735 are male an 5,469 are female. Oot o the total population 37 or 0.39% wur Native Indian. 8,117 o the total population wur Catholic an 1,318 wur affiliatit tae ither releegions. There are 3,497 hoosehauld o which 3,370 are awn occupeed.

lines.value: Kaunissaare is a veelage in Anija Pairish, Harju Coonty in northren Estonie. It's located sooth o the toun o Kehra, efter Lehtmetsa. The dounset is situatit aroond the Kaunissaare Reservoir on the Jägala River. The reservoir is pairt o the Tallinn watter supply seestem an is connectit via canals tae Pirita River, Aavoja an Soodla River. The node wis opened in 1984. Kaunissaare haes a population o 90 as o 1 Januar 2010.

lines.value: Maiolo is a comune (municipality) in the Province o Rimini in the Italian region Emilia-Romagna, locatit aboot 135 km sootheast o Bologna an aboot 35 km sooth o Rimini. As o 31 Dizember 2004, it haed a population o 807 an a aurie o 24.4 km².

lines.value: Maiolo borders the follaein municipalities: Montecopiolo, Novafeltria, Pennabilli, San Leo, Talamello.

lines.value: Efter the referendum o 17 an 18 Dizember 2006, Maiolo wis detached frae the Province o Pesaro an Urbino (Marche) tae join Emilia-Romagna an the Province o Rimini on 15 August 2009.

lines.value: Elisabeth o Fraunce (Élisabeth; 22 November 1602 - 6 October 1644) wis the first wife o Keeng Philip IV o Spain. She wis the eldest daughter o Henry VI o Fraunce an Marie de' Medici an as a result wis the sister o the future Louis XIII o Fraunce, whom she haed a good relationship wi. She wis the subject o several pentins bi the painter Velázquez, as wis her youngest daughter Maria Theresa. Queen Isabel (as kent in Spain) died o Smallpox aged 41. Her husband remarried
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: On 25 November 1615, Elisabeth mairit Philip IV o Spain, then kent as the Prince o Asturias (traditional title for the heir tae the Spaingie throne) Kent in Spain as Isabel de Borbón she became the Princess o Asturias at the age o thirteen. The marriage wis pairt o a wider match atween Fraunce an Spain, whereby Elisabeth's brither Louis XIII wad mairy Philip's sister Anne (the parents o Louis XIV o Fraunce)

lines.value: Mycenaean Greece (or Mycenaean ceevilisation) wis the last phase o the Bronze Age in Auncient Greece (c. 1600–1100 BC). It represents the first advanced ceevilisation in mainland Greece, wi its palatial states, urban organisation, warks o airt an writin seestem.

lines.value: () is the caipital ceety o Kanagawa Prefectur, the seicont lairgest ceety in Japan efter Tokyo, an the 53rd maist populous ceety proper in the warld. It lees on Tokyo Bay, sooth o Tokyo, in the Kantō region o the main island o Honshū. It is a major commercial hub o the Greater Tokyo Aurie. Yokohama's population o 3.6 million maks it Japan's lairgest incorporatit ceety. Yokohama developit rapidly as Japan's prominent port ceety follaein the end o Japan's relative isolation in the mid-19t century, an is thir days ane o its major ports alang wi Kobe, Osaka, Nagoya, Hakata, Tokyo, an Chiba.

lines.value: The naitional Emblem o Ethiopie haes been in its current form syne 1996. It contains a golden pentagram radiatin rays o licht on a blue shield. The day the pentagram stands for the unity o the fowk an the naitionality o Ethiopie. The emblem an aa appears on the centre o the Banner o Ethiopie. In 1975, an earlier version o the emblem o Ethiopie wis adoptit, consistin o a plow on a yellae sunburst surroondit bi a wreath. It wis associatit wi the Derg regime. Prior tae 1975, thare wis a European-heraldry influenced ryal coat o airms for the Empire o Ethiopie.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Haifa Destrict (, Mehoz Ḥeifa) is an admeenistrative destrict surroondin the ceety o Haifa, Israel. The destrict is ane o sax admeenistrative destricts o Israel, an its caipital is Haifa. The destrict land aurie is 864 km 2 (299.3 mi 2 ). Accordin tae the Israel Central Bureau o Statistics, at the end o 2005, the population o the destrict stuid at 858,000, o which 71.27% are Jewish, 18.81% are Arab Muslims, 1.78% are Arab Christians, 2.52% are Druze, an 4.9% are "no classified bi releegion", an grew at an average annual rate o 0.8%.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The current offeecial regional admeenistrative diveesions o Greece () wis institute in 1987. Awtho best pit ower intae Inglis an Scots as "regions", the transcription peripheries is sometimes uised, mibbe tae distinguish them frae the tradeetional regions whilk they replacit. The Inglis wird 'periphery' is derivit frae the, whilk in Greek (but no in Inglis) means 'region' an aw. There are 13 regions (nine on the mainland an fower island groups), which (till 2010) wur further subdividit intae the nou abolished 54 prefecturs. Traditionally, Greece wis dividit intae 10 regions, whilk is whiles still referred tae in popular discourse. Thae isna tae be ramfeeselt wi the new regions, tho the new regions lairgely haes their springheid in the umwhile anes, acause thare auries o divergence. For insaumple, the new region o the Peloponnese disna include aw o the landmass tradeetionally kent as the Peloponnese; the excludit pairt nou fins itsel in the region o Wastren Greece. The first seiven regions wis established bi the then-rulin militar regime in 1971, but they wur abolished efter the faw o Georgios Papadopoulos in November 1973. The current regions wur creatit bi Law 1622/1986 an Presidential Decree 51/1987, an wur conceivit as an auxiliary regional level o the central govrenment. Wi ongaun decentralisation, they wur accordit mair pouers in the 1997 Kapodistrias reform o local an regional govrenment, an wur feenally transformit intae fully separate entities bi the 2010 Kallikratis plan (Law 3852/2010), whilk entered intae effect on 1 Januar 2011. The govrenment-appointit general secretar wis replacit wi a popularly electit regional govrenor an a regional cooncil wi 5-year terms, while mony pouers o the abolished prefectur wur transferred tae the regions. As regional organs o the central govrenment, the new regions wur in turn replacit bi seiven decentralisir admeenistrations, whilk group frae ane tae three regions unner a govrenment-appointit general secretar. Haein mairches wi the region o Central Macedonie there is ae autonomous region, Munt Athos (Agion Oros, or "Holy Muntain"), a monastic community unner Greek sovereignty. It is on the eastmaist o the three lairge peninsulaes stentin intae the Aegean frae the Chalcidice Peninsulae. Through the admeenistrative reform o 2011, kent as the Kallikratis plan, seiven new admeenistrative diveesions (διοικήσεις) haes been creatit:

lines.value: Isla de la Juventud ("Isle o Youth") is the seicont-lairgest Cuban island an the seivent-lairgest island in the Wast Indies (efter Cuba itsel, Hispaniola, Jamaica, Puerto Rico, Trinidad, an Andros Island). The island wis cried the Isle o Pines (Isla de Pinos) till it wis renamit in 1978. The island haes an aurie an is 50 km sooth o the island o Cuba, across the Gulf of Batabanó. The island lies amaist directly sooth o Havana an Pinar del Río an is a Special Municipality (2,419 km2), no pairt o ony province. The Isle o Youth is, therefore, admeenistered directly bi the central govrenment o Cuba. The lairgest o the 350 islands in the Canarreos Airchipelago (Archipiélago de los Canarreos), the island haes an estimatit population o 100,000. The caipital an lairgest ceety is Nueva Gerona in the north, an the seicont-lairgest an auldest ceety is Santa Fe in the interior. Ither commonties include Columbia, Mac Kinley, Santa Bárbara, Cuchilla Alta, Punta del Este, Sierra de Caballos an Sierra de Casas.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Glayva is a liqueur produced in Leith, bi Whyte and Mackay Ltd. It is marketit wi the slogan 'baist liqueur in the warld'. Glayva is made frae a blend o aged Scotch whiskies, yerbs, anise, cloves, awmonds, heather honey, an citrus fruits. It haes a deep gowd colour an a distinctive flavour. Its name is an anglicised spellin o Glè Mhath, which means 'very guid' in Scots Gaelic.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Sarnakunk (, Romanisit as Sarrnakunk’, Sarnakunq an Sarrnakunk an aw; umwhile, Saybalu) is a veelage an rural commonty (municipality) in the Syunik Province o Armenie. The Naitional Statistical Service o the Republic o Armenie (ARMSTAT) reportit its population wis 519 in 2010, up frae 514 at the 2001 census.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Petrogradsky Destrict () is a destrict o the federal ceety o St. Petersburg, Roushie. It borders the Bolshaya Nevka River in the north an in the east, the Neva River in the sooth, an auries aroond the Malaya Neva River in the wast. Destrict's population: Petrogradsky Destrict comprises the follaein municipal okrugs:
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Development o wha wad become the Petrogradsky Destrict began in Mey 1703 when Peter the Great began construction o the Peter an Paul fortress on Zayachy Island. Unner Peter the Great, Petrogradsky destrict became the commercial an admeenistrative centre o Saunt Petersburg. It wis unner Peter the Great that Gorodskoy Island (the day Petrogradsky Island) emergit as St. Petersburg's commercial an admeenistrative centre. It wis settled ower time bi craftsmen an militar men, prosperin an becomin mair populatit through the 19t an early 20t centuries. The present destrict wis formit in 1917, wi the Primorsky Destrict being split aff in 1936. The current boondaries date back tae 1973. Even the day, Petrogradsky Destrict is a desirable location for commercial an residential real estate.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Beylikdüzü is a destrict in the European suburbs o Istanbul, Turkey, locatit north o the Sea o Marmara, sooth o Esenyurt, east o Büyükçekmece, an wast o Avcılar. It is assumed that Beylikdüzü wis first settled bi Greeks frae Byzantion in the seicont century AD as a fermin veelage. It later became a popular resort for residents o Constantiople in the Byzantine Empire, a status that continued efter the Faw o Constantinople tae the Ottoman Empire. The region wis referred tae as "Garden" in the later Ottoman period, an follaein the foondation o the Turkis Republic wis cried "Kavaklı," efter the lairge nummer o poplar trees, a name which wis uised till 2003. The modren name means "Plains o the Beylik." The slum destricts common in hintle Istanbul are rarer in Beylikdüzü, whaur a survey bi the municipal cooncil indicatit that 40% o residents hae a university degree.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The mayor is Yusuf Uzun o the AKP.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Chubin (, Romanisit as Chūbīn; kent as Chubāīn an Chūbāyen an aw) is a veelage in Kah Landwart Destrict, Davarzan Destrict, Sabzevar Coonty, Razavi Khorasan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population wis 232, in 66 faimilies.

lines.value: Colomi () is a locality in the Cochabamba Depairtment in central Bolivie. It is the seat o the Colomi Municipality, the seicont municipal section o the Chapare Province. At the time o census 2001 it haed a population o 3,699.

lines.value: San Martín Itunyoso is a Trique leid toun an municipality in Oaxaca in sooth-wastren Mexico. The municipality covers a aurie o 82.93 km². It is pairt o the Tlaxiaco Destrict in the sooth o the Mixteca Region. As o 2005, the municipality haed a total population o 2554.

lines.value: Such a Parcel of Rogues in a Nation is a Scottish folk sang whose lyrics are taken frae an eponymous Robert Burns poem o 1791. The lyrics are: Fareweel to a' our Scottish fame, Fareweel our ancient glory; Fareweel ev'n to the Scottish name, Sae fam'd in martial story. Now Sark rins over Solway sands, An' Tweed rins to the ocean, To mark where England's province stands- Such a parcel of rogues in a nation! What force or guile could not subdue, Thro' many warlike ages, Is wrought now by a coward few, For hireling traitor's wages. The English steel we could disdain, Secure in valour's station; But English gold has been our bane - Such a parcel of rogues in a nation! O would, ere I had seen the day That Treason thus could sell us, My auld grey head had lien in clay, Wi' Bruce and loyal Wallace! But pith and power, till my last hour, I'll mak this declaration; We're bought and sold for English gold- Such a parcel of rogues in a nation!
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The Millennium Stadium () is the naitional stadium o Wales, locatit in the caipital ceety, Cardiff.

lines.value: Axtla de Terrazas is a toun an municipality in San Luis Potosí in central Mexico.

lines.value: Shah Alam is the state caipital o Selangor, Malaysie an situatit athin the Petaling Destrict an a smaw portion o the neebourin Klang Destrict. It is locatit aboot wast o the kintra's caipital, Kuala Lumpur. Shah Alam replacit Kuala Lumpur as the caipital ceety o the state o Selangor in 1978 due tae Kuala Lumpur's incorporation intae a Federal Territory in 1974. Shah Alam wis the first planned ceety in Malaysie efter unthirldom frae Breetain in 1957.

lines.value: Alfred Werner (12 December 1866 - 15 November 1919) wis a Swiss chemist who wis a student at ETH Zurich an a professor at the Varsity o Zurich. He won the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1913 for proponin the octahedral configuration o transeetion metal complexes.

lines.value: The Nabataeans, an aa Nabateans (;  , compare to, ), war an auncient Arab fowk who inhabitit northren Arabia an the Soothren Levant, an whose settlements in AD 37 – c. 100, gae the name o Nabatene tae the borderland atween Arabie an Sirie, frae the Euphrates tae the Reid Sea.

lines.value: Lina Medina (born September 27, 1933) is a Peruvian woman who is the youngest confirmed mither in medical history, givin birth at the age o five years, seiven months an 17 days. She lives in Lima, the caipital o Peru.

lines.value: In mathematics an mathematical logic, Boolean algebra is the branch o algebra in which the values o the variables are the truith values true an false, uisually denotit 1 an 0 respectively. Instead o elementary algebra whaur the values o the variables are nummers, an the main operations are addeetion an multiplication, the main operations o Boolean algebra are the conjunction an denotit as ∧, the disjunction or denotit as ∨, an the negation nae denotit as ¬. It is thus a formalism for descrivin logical relations in the same wey that ordinar algebra descrives numeric relations.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Faith Hill (born Audrey Faith Perry; September 21, 1967) is an American sangster, actress an record producer. She is ane o the maist successfu country airtists o aw time, haein sauld mair nor 40 million albums warldwide. Hill is mairied tae American sangster Tim McGraw, wi wham she haes recordit several duets.

lines.value: Liz McManus is a politeecian in the Republic o Ireland, an a member o the Irish pairlament in Dublin, representin the Labour Pairty. She represents the Wicklow consteetuency in Dáil Éireann, an haes been the depute chief o her pairty syne 2002.

lines.value: Wine is an alcoholic drink aften makkit o fermentit grape juice. The naitural chemeecal balance o grapes is sic that thay can ferment athoot the addin o succars, aicids, enzymes or ither nuitrients. Wine is makkit bi fermentin prannit grapes uisin monie kyndes o baurm whilk eat the succars foond in the grapes an chynge them intae alcohol. Unalike varieties o grapes an strains o baurms are uised dependin on the kyndes o wine bein makkit.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Park Ji-yoon (born 3 Januar 1982) is a Korean pop sangster, actress, an model, who debuted as a Haitai model at age 13.Park Ji Yoon is well kent in Korea an abroad for her actin, singin an modellin skills. She has a B.F.A. frae Namseoul University in Environmental Airt & Design.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Efter debutin as a commercial model at the age o 13, she released her first album in 1997, titled Haneulsaek Ggoom (하늘색 꿈, "Sky Blue Dream"). Her hit singles "Haneulsaek Ggoom" frae her debut album, "Seonginshik" frae her fourth, an "Nam Namjaya" frae Man, receivin a lot o love frae fans. Housomeivver, due tae creative differences, Park left JYP Entertainment efter her saxt album; she felt that insteid o showin her true sel as an airtist, she wis being controlled bi producer Park Jin-young. Park then teuk an extendit break frae singin an entered the film an muisical fields. Efter 6 years, Park returned wi her seivent album, Ggot, Dashi Cheotbunjjae (꽃, 다시 첫번째, "Flower, Again for the First Time"). Leavin ahint her sexy image frae "Seonginshik", Park attemptit tae put her experiences o bein in her 20s intae this album, writin three o the sangs on it an haein creative input in producin the album an designin its cover. She made her comeback wi the sang "Baraejin Kieukae" ("바래진 기억에", "In My Fading Memory") on MBC's ''Show! Eumak Jungshim'' on 2 Mey 2009 an on SBS's Inkigayo on 3 Mey. The sang wis written an producit bi Dear Cloud.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The Maldonado Depairtment (), wi an aurie o an 161,571 indwallers, is locatit tae the southeast o Uruguay. Its caipital is Maldonado.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Neebourin depairtments are Rocha tae the east, Lavalleja tae the north an northwast, an Canelones tae the wast. Mony o the Maldonado name is tracit back tae Puerto Rican faimily lines. Limitit tae the soothweast bi the Río de la Plata an tae the sootheast bi the Atlantic Ocean, several creeks flow throu the depairtment, maist o which are tributaries o the River Plate: the Maldonado, José Ignacio, Garzón, Pan de Azúcar an the Aigua. Near the coast several lagoons are foond: Laguna del Sauce, del Diario, José Ignacio an Garzón. Three main geostructural regions can be foond athin the boondaries o the depairtment: Located in the humid subtropical region, the average temperature is law compared tae that o the rest o the kintra (aroond 17 °C), as are the precipitation levels (up tae 1,000 mm yearly, on average).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The oreegin o its name can be tracit back tae the year 1530, wi the return tae Spain o Sebastian Cabot, who haed left the continent earlier that year, in Januar, leavin Lieutenant Francisco Maldonado near Maldonado's bay. The strategic importance o that bay led tae the decision bi Montevideo's govrenor Joaquin de Viana tae big a dounset in Portezuelo (near the Laguna del Diario) in 1755. Twa years later, in 1757, a ceevil an militar dounset wis foondit aroond the bay an in the neebourin Gorriti Island. Ither dounsets suin follaeed in the aurie, wi the intention o limitin the Portuguese expansion. In 1828, the depairtment o Maldonado wis creatit, containin as well the territories nou belangin tae the depairtment o Rocha, an maist o Lavalleja.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Thare are three main economic centres in the depairtment, locatit in the main urban auries: Tourism, especially centred aroond Punta del Este, La Barra, Jose Ignacio an Piriápolis, haes been ane o the main soorces o income for the depairtment syne the 1950s. It haes been the main cause for its unique urban concentration o the population an aw (94% oot o the tot). The Laguna del Sauce Internaitional Airport is a significant local economic motor.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: As o the 2011 census, Maldonado Depairtment haed a population o 164,300 (80,865 male an 83,435 female) an 110,794 hoosehaulds. Thare are 11,151 business premises (2011) an aw.Demografic data for Maldonado Depairtment in 2010: :Landwart population Accordin tae the 2011 census, Maldonado depairtment haes a landwart population o 5,159.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The executive pouer is exercisit bi the Intendencia Departamental de Maldonado. The Intendant is electit ivery five years wi the possibility o reelection. The legislative pouer is exercisis bi the Junta Departamental. On 15 Mairch 2010, bi the Act o Ley Nº 18.653, the follaein municipalities wur formit in the Maldonado Depairtment: Source: Intendencia Departamnetal de Maldonado

lines.value: Khimki () is a ceety in Moscow Oblast, Roushie, situatit juist northwast o Moscow, at the wast bank o the Moscow Canal. Population: 207,425 (2010 Census); 141,000 (2002 Census); 106,000 (1977); 23,000 (1939).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Khimki wis offeecially foondit in 1939. It wis establisht aroond a railwey station wi the same name which haed existit syne 1850 on the Moscow-Saunt Petersburg Railwey. Currently, the ceety o Khimki is directly adjacent tae the territory o the ceety o Moscow. Khimki wis the steid o the closest German advance tae Moscow in November–Dizember 1941. A memorial markin this in a form o a giant tank trap is locatit at the "Kilometer 23" pynt (55°54´46.103"N, 37°24´10.577"E) o Leningradskoye Heich-gate, the highway tae St. Petersburg, juist short o a intersection wi the Moscow-St.Petersburg railwey, an close tae the IKEA shoppin center. Efter Warld War II, Khimki became hame tae several Soviet aerospace defence development centres, which became the principal employers for the majority o the ceety population. This included R&D enterprises which designed surface-tae-air missiles for S-75, S-125, S-200, S-300 Soviet air defence seestems, ingines for intercontinental ballistic missiles an satellite launch vehicles, an ither teeps o equipment. For this raison, Khimki wis aff leemits for aw foreigners visitin the kintra, despite its location on a heich-gate atween Moscow an its major internaitional airport.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Athin the framewirk o admeenistrative diveesions, it is incorporatit as Khimki Ceety Unner Oblast Jurisdiction—an admeenistrative unit wi the status equal tae that o the destricts. As a municipal diveesion, Khimki Ceety Unner Oblast Jurisdiction is incorporatit as Khimki Urban Okrug.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: In recent years, the population o the ceety o Khimki haes continued tae grow rapidly due tae massive residential biggin construction driven bi its proximity tae the Moscow megapolis which is densely populatit an needs new auries for expansion. The ceety enjoys a great deal o commercial activity due tae its location atween Moscow an ane o its main airports, Sheremetyevo. Some aerospace development centres locatit in Khimki currently contribute tae a program o the Internaitional Space Station. The ceety is hame tae ane o the lairgest shoppin maws in Roushie, which featurs French chain store Auchan an Swadish furnitur retailer IKEA. In 2010, the ceety wis the location o protests ower the new Moscow-Saunt Petersburg motorwey bein biggit throu the Khimki Forest.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Komsomolsk () is a toun an the admeenistrative centre o Komsomolsky Destrict o Ivanovo Oblast, Roushie, locatit on the Ukhtokhma River (Uvod's tributar) wast o Ivanovo. Population:
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: It wis foondit in 1931 an grantit toun status in 1950.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Komsomolsk serves as the admeenistrative centre o Komsomolsky Destrict. Prior tae the adoption o the Law #145-OZ On the Admeenistrative-Territorial Diveesion o Ivanovo Oblast in Dizember 2010, it wis admeenistratively incorporatit separately as an admeenistrative unit wi the status equal tae that o the destricts. Municipally, Komsomolsk is incorporatit athin Komsomolsky Municipal Destrict as Komsomolskoye Urban Dounset.

lines.value: The Alawites, kent as Alawi, Nusayris an Ansaris an aw (‘Alawīyyah,  , an ) are a prominent meestical an syncretic releegious group who follae a branch o the Twaler schuil o Shia Islam.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The Alawites tak their name frae [[Ali|]] cousin an son-in-law o Imam an the fowert an last "Richtly Guidit Caliph" o Sunni Islam. Till fairly recently Alawites wur referred tae as "Nusairis", namit efter Abu Shu'ayb Muhammad ibn Nusayr (d. ca 270 h, 863 AD) who is reportit tae hae attendit the circles o the last three Imams o the prophet Muhammad's line. This name is considered derogatory, an thay refer tae thairsels as Alawites. In September 1920, French occupational forces institutit the policy o referrin tae them bi the term "'Alawi". In aulder soorces thay are aften referred tae as Ansaris, as this is hou thay referred tae thairsels, accordin tae the Reverend Samuel Lyde, who livit amang Alawites in the mid-19t century. Anither soorce states that "Ansari", as referrin tae Alawites, is simply a Wastren mistransliteration o Nosairi. Alawites are destinct frae the Turkis-based Alevi releegious sect, awtho the terms share seemilar etymologies.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Tradeetionally Alawites hae livit in the An-Nusayriyah muntains alang the Mediterranean coast o Sirie. Latakia an Tartus are the region's principal ceeties. The day Alawites are concentratit in the plains aroond Hama an Homs an aw. Alawites live in aw major ceeties o Sirie an aw. Thay hae been estimatit tae constitute aboot 11-12% o Sirie's population - 2.1 million fowk. Thare are fower Alawite confederations – Kalbiyah, Khaiyatin, Haddadin, an Matawirah – each dividit intae tribes. Alawites are concentratit in the Latakia region o Sirie, extendin north tae Antioch (Antakya), Turkey, an in an aroond Homs an Hama. Afore 1953 thay held reservit seats in the Sirie Pairlament, lik aw ither releegious commonties. Efter that, includin for the 1960 census, thare wur anerlie general Muslim an Christian categories, athout mention o subgroups in order tae reduce "communalism" (taïfiyya). Thare are aboot 2000 Alawites livin in the veelage o Ghajar, split atween Lebanon an the Golan Hichts an aw. In 1932, the residents o Ghajar wur gien the option o chuisin thair naitionality an owerwhelmingly chose tae be a pairt o Sirie, which haes a sizable Alawite minority. Prior tae the Sax-Day War, the residents o Ghajar wur coontit in the 1960 Sirie census. Whan Israel captured the Golan Hichts frae Sirie in 1967, Ghajar remained a nae-man's laund for twa an a hauf months.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Thare are an estimatit 100,000 tae 120,000 Alawites in Lebanon, whaur thay hae livit syne at least the 16t century. Thay are recognizit as ane o the 18 offeecial Lebanese sects, an due tae the efforts o thair leader Ali Eid, the Taif Greement o 1989 gae thaim twa reservit seats in the Pairlament. Lebanese Alawites live maistly in the Jabal Mohsen neebourheid o Tripoli, an in 15 veelages in the Akkar Destrict , an are mainly representit bi the Arab Democratic Pairty. Bab al-Tabbaneh, Jabal Mohsen clashes atween pro-Sirie Alawites an anti-Sirie Sunnis hae hauntit Tripoli for decades.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: In order tae avoid confusion wi Alevis, thay prefer the sel-appellation Arap Alevileri ("Arab Alevis") in Turkis. The term Nusayrī, which uised tae exist in (aften polemical) theological texts is revivit in recent studies an aw. In Çukurova, thay are namit as Fellah an Arabuşağı, the latter considered heichlie offensive bi Alawites, bi the Sunni population. A quasi-offeecial name uised pairticularly in 1930s bi Turkis authorities wis Eti Türkleri ("Hittite Turks"), in order tae conceal thair Arab oreegins. The day, this term is amaist obsolete but it is still uised bi some fowk o aulder generations as a euphemism. The exact nummer o Alawites in Turkey is unkent, but thare wur 185 000 in 1970 (this nummer suggest ca 400 000 in 2009). As Muslims, thay are no recordit separately frae Sunnis in ID registration. In the 1965 census (the last Turkis census whaur informants wur asked thair mither tongue), 180,000 fowk in the three provinces declared thair mither tongue as Arabic. Housomeivver, Arabic-speakin Sunni an Christian fowk are includit in this figur an aw.Alawites tradeetionally speak the same dialect o Levantine Arabic wi Sirie Alawites. Arabic is best preservit in landwart commonties an Samandağ. Younger fowk in Çukurova ceeties an (tae a lesser extent) in İskenderun tend tae speak Turkis. Turkis spoken bi Alawis is distinguished bi Alawi an nan-Alawi alike wi its pairticular accents an vocabulary. Knowledge o Arabic alphabet is confined tae releegious leaders an men who haed wirkit or studiet in Arab kintras. Alawites show a considerable pattern o social mobility. Till 1960s, thay uised tae wirk bund tae Sunni aghas aroond Antakya an thay wur amang the poorest fowk in Çukurova. The day, Alawis are prominent in economic sectors sic as transportation an commerce. A lairge professional middle-class haed emergit an aw.In recent years, thare haes been a tendency o exogamy, pairticularly amang males who haed attendit varsities an/or haed livit in ither pairts o Turkey. Thir marriages are heichlie toleratit but exogamy o weemen, as in ither patrilineal groups, is uisually disfavoured. Alawites, lik Alevis, mainly hae strang leftist poleetical preferences. Housomeivver, some fowk in landwart auries (uisually members o notable Alawite faimilies) mey be foond supportin secularist conservative pairties sic as True Path Pairty. Maist Alawis feel discriminatit bi the policies o Diyanet İşleri Başkanlığı.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Claudio Ranieri (born 20 October 1951 in Roum) is an Italian fitbaw manager an umwhile defender. He is the current manager o French club Nantes, syne Juin 2017. He haes previously managed mony ither well-kent European clubs, namely Napoli, Fiorentina, Valencia, Atlético Madrid, Chelsea, Parma, Juventus, Roma, Internazionale an lastly Leicester City. He surprisingly won the Inglis Premiership title wi Leicester City F.C. in Mey 2016, but wis sacked in the follaein saison, in Februar 2017.

lines.value: Roquevaire () is a commune in the Huveaune glen atween Aubagne an Auriol in the Bouches-du-Rhône depairtment in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region in soothren Fraunce. Its inhabitants are cried Roquevairois. The communes o Lascours, Pont de l'etoile ad Pont de Joux are attached tae Roquevaire an aw. The main attraction is the organ in the St Vincent Kirk which is the lairgest organ in Fraunce. The toun featurs a internaitional organ festival in September.

lines.value: Catherine Ashton, Baroness Ashton o Upholland, PC (born 20 Mairch 1956) is a Breetish Labour politeecian who in 2009 acame the Heich Representative o the Union for Foreign Affairs an Security Policy for the European Union. Unner the Treaty o Lisbon, this post is combined wi the post o Vice-Preses o the European Commission. She held this poseetion until November 2014. Her poleetical career began in 1999 when she wis creatit a Life Peer (Baroness Ashton o Upholland) bi the Labour Govrenment. Unner this govrenment she acame the Parliamentary Unner-Secretar o State in the Depairtment for Eddication an Skills in 2001 an subsequently in the Depairtment for Constitutional Affairs an Meenistry o Justice in 2004. She scame a Privy Councillor (PC) in Mey 2006. Catherine Ashton wis appyntit Leader o the Hoose o Lords an Lord Preses o the Cooncil in Gordon Brown’s first Cabinet in Juin 2007. She wis instrumental in steerin the EU's Treaty o Lisbon through the UK's upper chamber. In 2008, she succeedit Peter Mandelson as Commissioner for Trade in the European Commission. In December 2009, she acame the first person tae tak on the role o Heich Representative o the Union for Foreign Affairs an Security Policy that wis creatit bi the Treaty o Lisbon. As Heich Representative, Baroness Ashton serves as the EU's foreign policy chief. Ashton teuk a central negotiatin role in the P5+1 talks wi Iran which led tae the 2013 Geneva interim agreement on Iranian nuclear program.

lines.value: Brae (Auld Norse: Breiðeið, meanin "the wide isthmus") is a settlement on the mainland o the Shetland Islands in Scotland. Tradeetionally a fishin veelage, wi the construction o the nearby Sullom Voe Oil Terminal in the 1970s Brae grew rapidly, mergin wi the nearby veelage o Northbrae.

lines.value: Iona Abbey is locatit on the Isle o Iona, juist off the Isle o Mull on the Wast Coast o Scotland. It is ane o the auldest an maist important releegious centres in Wastren Europe. The abbey wis a focal pynt for the spread o Christianity throughout Scotland an marks the foundation o a monastic community bi St. Columba, when Iona wis pairt o the Kinrick o Dál Riata.

lines.value: Mezquital (Tepehuan: Boodamtam) is a ceety an seat o the Mezquital Municipality in the state o Durango, north-wastren Mexico. It is situatit in the northeast o the municipality, near the boondar wi the Municipality o Suchil. Thare is uncertainty as tae the offeecial name o this municipal caipital. Accordin tae a online encyclopedia o Mexico's municipalities producit bi the federal Secretariat o Govrenance, the name o this ceety is simply Mezquital, but the federal postal service gies San Francisco del Mezquital, which is the name o the seicont convent foondit in the vicinity durin the colonial era.

lines.value: The Vilyuy River (an aa Vilyui, ; ) is river o the Central Siberian Plateau,  langest tributary o the Lena River. At a length o approximately 2,650 km lang, it is maistly within the Sakha Republic. Its basin extends tae aboot 491,000 km².

lines.value: Banfield is a ceety in the Lomas de Zamora Partido in Buenos Aires Province, Argentinae, sooth o the centre o Buenos Aires. It fuirms pairt o the Greater Buenos Aires metro aurie.

lines.value: In 1873 Banfield railwey station, namit efter the Inglisman Edward Banfield, the first general manager o the Breetish-awned Buenos Aires Great Southern Railway (), wis opened. On 19 August 1873, the first plots o land in the aurie wur advertisit for sale an extensive development teuk place frae the 1880s onwairds.

lines.value: The ceety is hame tae Club Atlético Banfield fitbaa club foondit in 1896, an tae the Lomas Athletic Sports Club.

lines.value: Perhaps Banfield's maist significant cultural insitituion is its Julián Aguirre Conservatory o Muisic, foondit bi renoun clessical componer an conductor Alberto Ginastera, in 1951. Hostin aboot 2,000 students yearly, it is the maist important schuil o clessical an choral muisic in Argentinae an is the alma mater o muisical instructors an scholars throuoot the kintra an Laitin Americae. The writer Julio Cortázar, tho born in Belgium, spent hintle o his bairnheid in Banfield. Banfield wis hame o the renouned tango componer Alfredo De Angelis an the popular sangster Sandro an aw.

lines.value: AirAsia Berhad () is a Malaysie low-cost airline based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysie. It has been named the world's best low-cost airline, and a pioneer of low-cost travel in Asia. AirAsia group operates domestic an international flights to 100 destinations in 22 countries. Its main hub is the klia2 (LCCT) at Kuala Lumpur Internaitional Airport (KLIA). Its affiliate airlines Thai AirAsia, Indonesia AirAsia, Philippines AirAsia an AirAsia Zest have hubs in Don Mueang Internaitional Airport, Soekarno-Hatta International Airport an Ninoy Aquino Internaitional Airport respectively.

lines.value: The Autobianchi Y10 is a city caur manufactured bi the Italian automaker Fiat frae 1985 tae 1996 an marketit unner the Autobianchi brand in Italy an unner the Lancia brand in maist export markets (as Lancia Y10). The caur wis manufactured at the Autobianchi plant in Desio, Milan till 1992 an efter that in Arese, near Alfa Romeo plants. It wis designed on the first-generation Fiat Panda floorpan, shortened bi aboot 10 centimetres (3.9 in) an wi softer suspension settings. It affered a vera hie level o trim for its market segment. Initially introduced in 1985 unner the Autobianchi brand, uisin the FIRE ingine in 1.0 and 1.1 L guises an Fiat's Brazilian built SOHC 1049 cc ingine ance uised in the Autobianchi A112 Abarth an the Fiat 127's hottest version, this time turbocharged tae produce 85 PS (62.5 kW) in the Y10 Turbo. Eventually, the Autobianchi badge wis dropt in favour o Lancia's except in Italy; a textbook case o badge ingineerin. Alang wi the Autobianchi badge the turbocharged ingine wis dropped an a mair refined, if slower, version topped the range, the 1.3 GT i.e., with 76 PS (56 kW). It wis pipped tae the European Caur o the Year for 1986 bi the Ford Scorpio. It sauld rather well, especially tae women, for its unique style, luxurious trim an the continuously variable transmission that equipt certain versions. Its excellent aerodynamics, characterized bi vera clean lines an a Kammback, an aa providit great fuel economy. Sales in the Unitit Kinrick wur no so strang, though it remained on sale till Lancia's wi'drawal frae the Breetish market (an aw ither richt-hand drive markets) in 1994.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Midi-Pyrénées (; Occitan: Miègjorn-Pirenèus or Mieidia-Pirenèus) is the laorgest region in metropolitan Fraunce bi land aurie, lairger than the Netherlands or Denmark. Midi-Pyrénées haes nae historical or geographical unity. It is ane o the regions o Fraunce creatit airtificially in the late 20t century tae serve as a hinterland an zone o influence for its caipital, Toulouse, ane o a haundful o so-cried "balancin metropolises" (''métropoles d'équilibre''). Anither example o this is the region o Rhône-Alpes which wis creatit as the region for Lyon. The name chosen for the new region wis decidit bi the French central govrenment athoot reference tae the historical provinces (too mony o them inside the region) an based purely on geography: Midi (i.e. "soothren Fraunce") - Pyrénées (Pyrénées muntains that serve as the region's soothren bundary). The French adjective an name o the inhabitants o the region is: Midi-Pyrénéen.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Álvaro Enrique Arzú Yrigoyen (born 14 Mairch 1946, in Guatemala Ceety) wis the 32nt Preses o Guatemala frae 14 Januar 1996 till 14 Januar 2000. He haes been electit Mayor o Guatemala Ceety on five occasions: in 1982, but wis preventit frae assumin office acause o a coup d'état; in 1986, this time assumin an servin his mandate; again in Januar 2004; an he wis re-electit for a third effective term in September 2007 wi 55 percent o the popular vote. Arzú wis re-electit in September 2011 for a third consecutive term as mayor o the caipital, which began in Januar 2012.

lines.value: Terbium is a chemical element wi the seembol Tb an atomic nummer 65. It is a sillery-white rare yird metal that is malleable, ductile an saft enough tae be cut wi a knife. Terbium is never foond in naitur as a free element, but it is contained in mony minerals, includin cerite, gadolinite, monazite, xenotime an euxenite.

lines.value: An endangered species is a species o organisms that will likely acome extinct. The phrase 'endangered species' colloquially refers tae ony species that fits this description whauras conservation biologists typically with it refer tae species that are designatit Endangered in the IUCN Red List, whaurin "endangered" is the seicont maist severe conservation status for wild populations, follaein Critically Endangered. 3079 ainimals an 2655 plants are Endangered warldwide, compared wi 1998 levels o 1102 an 1197, respectively. The amoont, population trend, an conservation status o each species can be foond in the Leets o organisms bi population. Mony naitions hae laws that pertect conservation reliant species: for example, forbiddin huntin, restrictin land development, or creatin preserves.

lines.value: Ferrah Leni "Farrah" Fawcett (Februar 2, 1947 – Juin 25, 2009) wis an American actress an airtist. A multiple Gowden Globe an Emmy Awaird nominee, Fawcett rose tae internaitional fame when she posed for her iconic reid swimsuit poster an starred as private investigator Jill Munroe in the first saison o the televeesion series ''Charlie's Angels'' (1976–77).

lines.value: Dido played as a midfielder for Campeonato Brasileiro Série A clubs Flamengo an Santos. As a Santos player, he played two Série A games in 1984. He haes played in Israel an aw, muivin tae the kintra tae jyn Beitar Jerusalem, whaur he retired in 1996, an stairtit a coachin career, as Maccabi Holon's heid coach.

lines.value: Cook Strait lies atween the North an Sooth Islands o New Zealand. It connects the Tasman Sea on the northwast wi the Sooth Paceefic Ocean on the sootheast, an runs next tae the caipital ceety, Wellington. It is wide at its narraest pynt, an is considert ane o the maist dangerous an unpredictable watters in the warld.

lines.value: The Siege o Sidney Street o Januar 1911, an aa kent as the Battle o Stepney, wis a gunfecht in the East End o Lunnon atween a combined police an airmy force an twa Latvie revolutionars. The siege wis the culmination o a series o events that began in Dizember 1910, wi a attemptit jewellery robbery at Houndsditch in the Ceety o Lunnon bi a gang o Latvie immigrants which resultit in the murther o three polisemen, the woondin o twa ithers, an the daith o George Gardstein, the leader o the Latvie gang. An investigation bi the Metropolitan an City of London Police forces identifee'd Gardstein's accomplices, maist o wham wur arrestit athin twa weeks. The polis wur informit that the feenal twa members o the gang wur hidin at 100 Sidney Street in Stepney. The polis evacuatit local residents frae the environs, an on the fore-nuin o 3 Januar a firefecht breuk oot. Airmit wi inferior wappens, the polis sought assistance frae the airmy. The siege lastit for aboot sax oors. Towards the end o the staund-aff, the biggin caucht fire; nae single cause haes been identifee'd. Ane o the agitators in the biggin wis shot afore the fire teuk control. Whilk the London Fire Brigade wur dampin doun the ruins—in which thay foond the twa bodies—the biggin collapsed, killin a fireman, Superintendent Charles Pearson. The siege markit the first time the polis haed requestit militar assistance in Lunnon tae deal wi a airmit staund-aff. It wis the first siege in Breetain tae be caucht on camera an aw, as the events wur filmit bi Pathé News. Some o the fuitage included images o the then Hame Secretar, Winston Churchill. His presence caused a poleetical row ower the level o his operational involvement. At the subsequent trial in Mey 1911 o those arrestit for the Houndsditch jewellery robbery, aw but ane o the accusit wur acquittit; the sole conviction wis subsequently owerturned on appeal. The events wur feectionalisit in film—in The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934) an The Siege of Sidney Street (1960)—an novels. On the centenar o the events twa touer blocks in Sidney Street wur namit efter Peter the Painter, ane o the minor members o the gang wha wis probably no present at aither Houndsditch or Sidney Street. The murthert polismen an the fireman who dee'd are commemoratit wi memorial plaques.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Maria Anna Victoria o Bavarie (Maria Anna Christina Victoria ; 28 November 1660 - Died	20 Aprile 1690) wis a daughter-in-law o Keeng Louis XIV o Fraunce an wife o Louis o Fraunce, Dauphin o Fraunce, Grand Dauphin. The couple haed three childer in tot, ane of whom would become the first Bourbon Keeng o Spain in 1700. Considered boring at the French ryal coort, she died miserable an forgotten in 1690 at the Palace o Versailles aged 29. wis buried at the Ryal Basilica o Saint Denis. She wis known in Fraunce as Marie Anne Victoire de Bavière.

lines.value: The banner o the Netherlands is a horizontal tricolour o reid, white, an blue. Introduced in 1572, it is ane o the first tricolours an the auldest tricolour still in uise the day. Syne 1937, the banner haes offeecially been the naitional banner o the Netherlands an o the Kinrick o the Netherlands.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The naitional banner o the Netherlands is a tricolor banner. The horizontal fesses are baunds o equal size in the colours, frae tap tae bottom, reid (offeecially describit as a "bricht vermilion"), white (silver), an blue ("cobalt blue"). The banner proportions (width:lenth) are 2:3. The first stadtholder o the Dutch Republic wis William I o Orange, who jynt wi Dutch naitionalists an led the struggle for unthrildom frae Spain. Pairtly oot o respect for him, the first banner adoptit bi the Dutch wis a horizontal tricolour o orange, white, an blue. It became kent as the Prinsenvlag ("Prince's banner") an wis based on the livery o William o Orange. The orange dye wis parteecularly unstable an tendit tae turn reid efter a while, sae in the mid-17t century, red wis made the offeecial colour. The banner haes flewn syne then, but wis confirmed bi Ryal Decree anerlie in 1937, at the same time the colour parameters wur exactly defined. As the first revolutionary banner, it haes haed a seminal influence throughoot the warld, parteecularly on the Pan-Slavic colors o Roushie. Till aboot 1800, in the case o baith the orange- an the reid-striped versions, the nummer o stripes an thair order frequently varied.

It is a major tred centre atween the Caucasus, Roushie an Iran uisin the port o Bandar-e Anzali. Rasht is an aa a major tourist centre wi the resort o Masouleh in the adjacent muntains an the beaches o Caspian as some o the major attractions.

lines.value: Miloš Zeman (; born 28 September 1944) is the third an current Preses o the Czech Republic, in affice syne 8 Mairch 2013. Previously he served as the Prime Meenister o the Czech Republic frae 1998 tae 2002. As leader o the Czech Social Democratic Pairty durin the 1990s, he transformed it intae ane o the kintra's major pairties. He wis Chairman o the Chamber o Deputies, the lawer hoose o the Czech parliament, frae 1996 tae 1998. In Januar 2013, Zeman wis electit as Preses o the Czech Republic. He is the first directly electit Preses in Czech history; baith o his predecessors, Václav Havel an Václav Klaus, wur electit bi the Parliament.

lines.value: Winter solstice is an astronomical phenomenon which marks the shortest day an the langest nicht o the year. Winter solstice occurs for the Northren Hemisphere on 21 or 22 December an for the Soothren Hemisphere on 20 or 21 Juin. Each hemisphere's Winter solstice occurs on the ither's Simmer solstice.

lines.value: Durin the Northren Winter solstice in December, the sun is directly owerheid at the Tropic o Capricorn in the Soothren Hemisphere. Durin the Soothren Winter solstice in Juin, the sun is directly owerheid at the Tropic o Cancer in the Northren Hemisphere. This is acause the Yird is tiltit at an angle o 23.5 degrees.

lines.value: Madame de Montesson (Charlotte Jeanne Béraud; 4 October 1738– 6 Februar 1806) wis a mistress o Louis Philippe d'Orléans, Duke o Orléans an later his secret wife. The Hôtel de Montesson wis biggit for her, but wis destroyed bi fire in 1810. She wis an aa an aunt o Madame de Genlis.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Born in Paris an baptised as Charlotte Jeanne Béraud de La Haye de Riou she wis kent as Charlotte. She wis the anly daughter o Jean Béraud de La Haye de Riou an his wife Josefa Minard. The faimily war o Breton origin. In her early twenties she wad mairy Jean Baptiste de Montesson, Marquis o Montesson in October 1757. Montesson wis a widower in his seventies. The Marquis o Montesson wad die in 1769. Efter the daith o her elder brither the Marquis o La Haye de Riou, she inherited a smaw fortune an wad later acome a mistress o the Duke o Orléans. The couple wad eventually mairy in secret in 23 Aprile 1773 wi the authorisation o Keeng Louis XV. The keeng ordered that Madame de Montesson wad never acome the Duchess o Orléans. Sometime efter thair mairiage the Hôtel de Montesson wis biggit an Montesson wad die thare in 1806 haein spent a smaw period o time in the Temple Prison in Paris during the French Revolution. She wis buried at the Saint Roch Kirk, in Paris.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The Ryton plant was a car manufacturing plant located in Ryton-on-Dunsmore, Warwickshire, England. It was developed by the Rootes Group as a shadow factory in 1939 to produce aircraft engines for Warld War II. After the war, it became the headquarters of the group. Taken over by Peugeot in 1978, it shut in December 2006, and was subsequently redeveloped by Trenport Investments Ltd, for industrial use, in March 2007. The plant met its final demise in November 2007, when it was completely demolished.

lines.value: A Benedictine abbot frae Languedoc, Fraunce, oreeginally bapteezed Smaragdus. He becam a Benedictine, teuk the name Ardo, an sert unner Saunt Benedict o Aniane. Ardo directit the monastery schuil at Aniane an convoyed Saunt Benedict on his traivels. In 814, Ardo becam Saunt Benedict's successor whan the abbot wis made superior o the Aachen monastery in Germany. Ardo wrate the biography o Saunt Benedict o Aniane. He dee'd in 843. His feast day is on the 7t o Mairch.

lines.value: Tasmanie is an island an state o Australie an haes a sea mairch wi Victoria tae the north. Hobart is the maist muckle ceety an the state caipital. In the bygane Tasmanie wis kent as Van Diemans Laund. It haes a wee bit mair nor 500,000 indwallers. At 62,409 square kilometres Tasmanie is the lairgest island in Australie an 26t lairgest in the warld, houaniver it is the smawest state o Australie wi a aurie o aboot 68,401 km 2 .
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Asmara (,, Asmera), lang syne kent as Asmera, meanin "They (feminine plural) makkit them unite" in Tigrinya) is the caipital an lairgest ceety in Eritrea, hame tae a population o aroond 579,000 fowk. At an elevation o 2,325 metres (7,628 ft), Asmara is on the edge o an escarpment that is baith the northwastren edge o the Great Rift Valley an o the Eritrean hielands. Textiles an clothin, processed meat, beer, shoes, an ceramics are the major industrial products.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Asmara wis born oot o a union o fower villages that teuk place durin the twalt century. Oreeginally, it is said, thare wur fower clans livin in the Asmara aurie on the Kebessa Plateau: Gheza Gurtom, Gheza Shelele, Gheza Serenser an Gheza Asmae. Encouraged bi thair weemen, the men unitit the fower clans an defeatit the bandits who preyed on the aurie. Efter the victory, a new name wis gien tae the place, Arbaete Asmera which literally means, in the Tigrinya leic, "they (females) unitit fower". Eventually Arbaete wis dropped an it became cawed bi the italianized version o the wird — Asmara — tho thare is still a zone cawed Arbaete Asmera. The wastrenized version o the name is uised bi a majority o non-Eritreans, while the multilingual indwallers o Eritrea an neighborin fowks remain loyal tae the oreeginal pronunciation. The missionary Remedius Prutky passed throu Asmara in 1751, an describit in his memoirs that a kirk biggit thare bi Jesuit priests 130 years afore wis still intact. Asmara, which wis pairt o the independent kinrick o Medri Bahri, wad briefly come unner the occupation o the Breetish backed an supported Yohannes IV o what wad nou be cawed Ethiopie. Unner his brief an brutal occupation, he gae his trustit Ras Alula the title o governor o Medri Bahri, tae which the fowk resistit. The leaders o Asmara despised his occupation an focht in a hauf a decade lang protractit guerrilla warfare tae free themselves frae his brief occupation, tae which thay eventually became successfu. But the war caused a lot o sufferin an Asmara wis amaist desertit. Asmara acquired importance whan it wis occupied bi Italy in 1889 an became the naitional caipital in 1897. In the early 20t century, a railwey line wis biggit tae the coast, passin throu the toun o Ghinda, unner the direction o Carlo Cavanna. In baith 1913 an 1915 the ceety suffered ae slicht damage in lairge earthquakes. In the late 1930s the Italians chynged the face o the toun, wi a new structur an new buildings: Asmara wis cawed Piccola Roma (Little Rome). While Eritrea wis unner Italian colonial rule, architecturally conservative early-20t-century Europeans uised Asmara "tae experiment wi radical new designs." Nouadays the major pairt o buildings are o Italian oreegin, an shops still hae Italian names (e.g., Bar Vittoria, Pasticceria moderna, Casa del formaggio, an Ferramenta). Asmara wis populatit bi a numerous Italian community an consequently the ceety acquired an Italian airchitectural leuk. The ceety o Asmara haed a population o 98,000, o which 53,000 wur Italian Eritreans accordin tae the Italian census o 1939. This fact made Asmara the main "Italian toun" o the Italian empire in Africae. In aw Eritrea the Italians wur 75,000 in that year. Mony industrial investments wur made bi Italy in Asmara, but the beginnin o Warld War II stopped the blossomin industrialization o the aurie. Italy wis defeatit in 1941, an the Breetish administered the ceety frae 1941 tae 1952. In 1952, the Unitit Naitions resolved tae federate the umwhile colony unner Ethiopian rule. In 1961, emperor Haile Selassie I endit the "federal" arrangement an declared the territory tae be the 14t province o the Ethiopian Empire. Durin the Eritrean war for unthirldom frae Ethiopie, Asmara's airport became a key in the conflict, as it wis uised bi the Ethiopians tae obtain airms an supplies frae ootside supporters. The last toun tae faw tae the Eritrean Fowkliberation Front in the Eritrean War o Independence, it wis besieged in 1990 an wis surrendered bi Military o Ethiopie troops athoot a fecht on Mey 24, 1991. The ceety wis hame tae the US Airmy's Kagnew Station installation frae 1943 till 1977. In Asmara the main leid is Tigrinya. Inglis, Arabic, an Italian are widely spoken an unnerstood.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Venganza is the debut full-length album bi the Mexican daith metal baund, Hacavitz. It is the anerlie album tae featur Eduardo Guevara on guitar.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Uthai Thani (Thai อุทัยธานี) is ane o the provinces (changwat) o Thailand. Neighborin provinces are (frae north clockwise) Nakhon Sawan, Chai Nat, Suphan Buri, Kanchanaburi an Tak.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The province stretches frae the upper plains o the Chao Phraya river valley, tae muntains covered wi forests in the wast. The Sakae Krang River, a tributary o the Chao Phraya River is the main river o Uthai Thani province. The Huai Kha Khaeng Wildlife Sanctuary at the wastren bundary tae the province Tak an wis declared Warld Heritage Site in 1991. It covers 2,574 km², an hooses amaist aw o the forest ainimals o Sootheast Asie, includin tigers an elephants.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Oreeginally Mon an Lawa settled in the aurie. A first Thai dounset in the aurie wis Muang U Thai durin the Sukhothai period, but wis later abandoned whan the river chynged course. Patabeut, a member o the Karen ethnicity, revived the dounset at its currect place durin the Ayutthaya period. It served as a fort protectin the bundary o the kinrick then. Uthai Thani is maist famous as bein the hametoun o the faither o Keeng Rama I. Rama I an aa renamed the ceety frae its auld name Uthai tae Uthai Thani. In 1892 Keeng Chulalongkorn (Rama V) addit the aurie o Uthai Thani tae the Monthon Nakhon Sawan, an in 1898 formed the province.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The provincial seal depicts the pavilion at Wat Khao Sakaekrang. It hooses the statue o Thongdee, the faither o Keeng Rama I. The muntain in the backgrund seembolizes the location o the pavilion on tap o a hill. Provincial flouer is the Yellow Cotton Tree (Cochlospermum regium), provincial tree is Neem (Azadirachta indica v. siamensis). The banner o Uthai Thani depicts the provincial seal o Uthai Thani in the middle. The yellae colour in the tap o the banner is the seembol colour o the Chakri Dynasty, as Gowd as a precious metal is a seembol for the Thai monarchy. The green colour in bottom is the seembol colour o Keeng Rama I as he wis born on a Wadensday, which is associatit wi green in the Thai calendar. The text belaw the seal says Uthai Thani province.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The province is subdividit in 8 destricts (amphoe). Thir are further subdividit intae 70 subdestricts (tambon) an 642 veelages (muban).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Santa Isabel   is a ane o the 67 municipalities o Chihuahua, in northren Mexico. The municipal seat lees at Santa Isabel. The municipality covers an aurie o 1,040.8 km². As o 2005, the municipality haed a total population o 3,820 .

lines.value: Ot Serdtsa K Nebu (От Сердца к Небу) is the fowert full-length album bi the Roushie fowk metal baund Arkona. It wis released on 31 October 2007 through Sound Age Production an later through Napalm Records. The name translates tae "Frae The Hert Tae The Sky".
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The album receivit a positive review frae the Canadian Exclaim! magazine. The author notit the album's variations in tone an structur an wrote that Arkona haed "achievit the haurder task" o integratin haurd modren soonds an traditional tunes. The German edition o Metal Hammer awairdit 5 oot o points tae the album. About.com wrote that sangster Maria "Masha" Arkhipova wis an "excellent vocalist" who wis capable o performin baith soft sang an hairsk screamin an growlin wi a heich staundart.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Achacachi Municipality is ane o sax municipalities o the Omasuyos Province in the La Paz Depairtment in Bolivie. Its seat is Achacachi. The municipality is situatit in the northren Altiplano o the Bolivie Andes region on the eastren shore o Lake Titicaca bordered tae the north bi the Larecaja Province, tae the east bi the Los Andes Province, tae the sooth-east bi the Huarina Municipality, tae the wast bi the Santiago de Huata Municipality, tae the sooth bi Huatajata Municipality an Chúa Cocani Municipality (these fower municipalities wur cantons o the Achacachi Municipality till 2005, 2009, an 2010, respectively), tae the sooth-wast bi Lake Wiñaymarka an the northren pairt o Lake Titicaca, an tae the north-wast bi the Ancoraimes Municipality.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The fowk are predominantly indigenous citizens o Aymara descent (95.04 %).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Sơn Tây is an urban destrict an ceety in Hanoi, the caipital o Vietnam. It wis the caipital o Son Tay province afore mergin wi Ha Dong province in 1965. Son Tay lies 35 km wast o the caipital Hanoi an is aften referred tae as “sodger toun” due tae the proliferation o airmy barracks an militar institutions that surroonds the toun, includin the Vietnamese Fowkairmy Infantry Academy. A U.S. militar preesoner-o-war rescue attempt occurred here in the early fore-nuin oors of 21 November 1970. A special task force o Green Berets, supportit bi Air Force an Navy assets, raidit a POW camp locatit in the province. The raid failed when it wis discovered thare wur nae preesoners thare, but managit tae depairt wi minimal loss in equipment an nae loss o life for the raidin force. Son Tay’s futur is seen as being vera hintle that o a satellite ceety o Hanoi an as a result thare are plans tae relocate universities an ither public facilities tae Son Tay whaur laund is cheaper an mair plentiful. The govrenment hae commencit this ambitious program bi duplicatin the main Hanoi—Sơn Tây carriagewa which wis expectit tae be completit in 2009. Pham Van Dong, a general wis frae Son Tay.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Son Tay is famous for its thoosan year auld veelages, such as Duong Lam which retains a collection o vernacular airchitectur wi biggins an temples built uisin laterite bricks.

lines.value: Ernmas is a Erse mither goddess, mentioned in Lebor Gabála Érenn an "Cath Maige Tuired" as ane o the Tuatha Dé Danann. Her dochters include the trinity o eponymous Erse goddesses Ériu, Banba an Fódla, the trinity o war goddesses the Badb, Macha an the Mórrígan (who is namit Anann an aw), an a trinity o sons, Glonn, Gnim, an Coscar an aw.Her ither sons are Fiacha an Ollom. Ernmas wis killed durin the first battle o Mag Tuired.

lines.value: Guéthary haes existit as a smaw fishin veelage syne the early 12t century. It became famous for huntin whales in the 13t century. Actually, the linguist Henri Gavel put doun the name o the toun tae the Gascon wird getari, 'post for watchin' (the whales), while this assumption haes been disputit bi current linguists, who trace the name back tae laitin caetaria, 'fish processin facility', supportit bi airchaeological evidence unyirdit baith in Guéthary an the same name Getaria frae Gipuzkoa.

lines.value: Giovanni Bellini (c. 1430 – 26 November 1516) wis an Italian Renaissance penter, probably the best kent o the Bellini faimily o Venetian penters. His faither wis Jacopo Bellini, his brither wis Gentile Bellini (wha, during his lifetime, wis mair heichly regairdit nor Giovanni, awtho the reverse is true the day), an his brither-in-law wis Andrea Mantegna. He is conseedert tae hae revolutionised Venetian pentin, muivin it taewart a mair sensuous an colouristic style. Throu the uise o clear, slow-dryin ile pents, Giovanni creatit deep, rich tints an detailed shadins. His sumptuous colourin an fluent, atmospheric landscapes haed a great effect on the Venetian pentin schuil, especially on his pupils Giorgione an Titian.

lines.value: Harry Potter is a series o fantasy novelles written bi Breetish author J. K. Rowling. The novelles chronicle the life o a young wizard, Harry Potter, an his friends Hermione Granger an Ron Weasley, aw o whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The main story arc concerns Harry's struggle against Lord Voldemort, a dark wizard wha intends tae acome immortal, owerthrow the wizard govrenin bouk kent as the Ministry of Magic, an subjugate aw wizards an Muggles. Syne the release o the first novelle, ''Harry Potter an the Filosofer's Stane'', on 26 Juin 1997, the beuks hae foond immense popularity, creetical acclaim an commercial success warldwide. Thay hae attracted a wide adult audience as well as younger readers, an are eften considered cornerstones o modren young adult leeteratur. The series haas an aa haed its share o creeticism, includin concern aboot the increasinly dark tone as the series progressed, as well as the eften gruesome an graphic violence it depicts. , the beuks hae sauld mair nor 450 million copies warldwide, makin them the best-sellin beuk series in history, an hae been translatit intae seiventy-three leids. The last fower beuks consecutively set records as the fastest-sellin beuks in history, wi the final instalment sellin roughly eleiven million copies in the Unitit States within twinty-fower oors o its release. The series wis oreeginally published in Inglis bi twa major publishers, Bloomsbury in the Unitit Kinrick an Scholastic Press in the Unitit States. A play, Harry Potter and the Cursed Child, based on a story bi Rowling, premiered in Lunnon on 30 Julie 2016 at the Palace Theatre, an its script wis published bi Little, Brown as the aicht beuk in the series. The oreeginal seiven beuks war adaptit intae an aicht-pairt film series bi Warner Bros. Pictures, which haes acome the seicont heichest-grossin film series o aw time . The franchise haes an aa generatit much tie-in merchandise, makin the Harry Potter brand worth in excess o $15 billion. A series o mony genres, includin fantasy, drama, comin o age an the Breetish schuil story (which includes elements o mystery, thriller, adventur, horror an romance), the warld o Harry Potter explores numerous themes an includes mony cultural meanins an references.<ref name="meanings">Sources that refer to the many genres, cultural meanings and references of the series include: * Accordin tae Rowling, the main theme is daith. Ither major themes in the series include prejudice, corruption, an madness. The success o the beuks an films haes ensured that the Harry Potter franchise continues tae expand, wi numerous derivative wirks, a travellin exhibeetion that premiered in Chicago in 2009, a studio tour in Lunnon that opened in 2012, a deegital platform on which J.K. Rowling updates the series wi new information an insicht, an a trilogy o spin-off films premiering in November 2016, amang mony ither developments. Maist recently, themed attractions, collectively kent as The Wizarding World of Harry Potter, hae been biggit at several Universal Parks & Resorts amusement parks aroond the warld.

lines.value: Pi, kent as '''Ludolph's nummer or Archimedes' constant''' an aw, is an irraitional nummer that's gey uissfu in mathematics an naitural philosophy. The seembol uised for it comes frae the 16t letter o the Greek ABC, π
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: π can be defined aither as the ratio atween the perimeter an the diameter o a circle, or as the area o a circle that's radius equals 1 (the unit circle).
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Acause π is an irraitional nummer, it canna be written wi a finite nummer o decimal places. It's kent that π is a transcendental nummer an aw; houaniver, the hypothesis that it is a ordinar nummer, haesna yet been pruiven the tae wey or the tither. Calculation o the vailyie o π tae sae monie decimal places as is possible haes become a popular task tae set gey swith computers. An approximate vailyie o π wis aareadies kent in the 20t C ACE in Babylon. Archimedes, in the 3d C ACE, fund the weel-kent approxmiation 22/7. In ther 17t C Ludolph Van Ceulen wis successfu in calculatin the vailyie o π tae 35 decimal places. In 1949 a computer (Eniac) wis uised for the first time, an calculatit the first 2 037 decimals. In 2003 the first 1 241 100 000 000 (1.241 billion) digits o π wis calculate. The vailyie o π roondit tae the first 64 digits (sequence A000796 in the OEIS) is thon: Ye can hae a keek at e'en mair digits o π:, , , .
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Cultur (frae the Laitin cultura ruitit frae colere, meanin "tae cultivate") for ordinar refers tae paiterns o human acteevity an the seembolic structurs that gies sic acteevity signeeficant importance. Different defineetions o "cultur" reflects different theoretical bases for unnerstaundin, or criteria for evaluatin, human acteevity. Cultur is manifestit in muisic, leeteratur, pentin an sculptur, theatre an film. Awtho some fowk identifees cultur in terms o consumption an consumer guids (as in hie cultur, law cultur, fowk cultur, or popular cultur), anthropologists unnerstaund "cultur" tae refer no juist tae consumption guids, but tae the general processes that produces sicna guids an gies thaim meanin, an tae the social relationships an practices that sicna objects an processes becomes embeddit in. For thaim, cultur sic includes technology, airt, science, as weel as moral seestems.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: A mammoth is ony species o the extinct genus Mammuthus. Thir proboscideans is members o the elephant faimlie an sib tae modren elephants. Thay war aften graithed wi lang, bowed tusks an, in northren species, a coat o lang hair. Thay wis tae the fore atween the Pliocene epoch fae 4.8 million year til aboot 4,500 year syne. The wird mammoth comes fae the Roushie мамонт mamont, aiblins in turn fae the Vogul (Mansi) leid.

lines.value: Nelspruit () offeecially renamed Mbombela () is a ceety o 221,474 fowk (2000) situatit in northeastren Sooth Africae. It is the caipital o the Mpumalanga province (umwhile Eastren Transvaal). Locatit on the Crocodile River, Nelspruit lies aboot 100 kilometres (60 miles) wast o the Mozambique border an 330 kilometres (205 miles) east o Johannesburg. The tounships o Nelspruit are Kanyamazane an Matsulu which are tens o kilometres east o Nelspruit. Thare are mony orange farms in the aurie aroond Nelspruit. It is a key manufacturin an agricultural hub for northeastren Sooth Africae. Major industries include the cannin o citrus fruit, paper production, furniture manufactur an timbermills. Fertile soils an subtropical climate provide perfect conditions for the growin o citrus an tropical fruits, mainly mango, bananae, avocado an Macadamia nuts.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Nelspruit wis foondit in 1905 bi three brithers o the Nel faimily who grazed thair cattle aroond the site o Nelspruit durin the winter months. Durin the Boer War, Nelspruit served briefly as the seat o govrenment for the Sooth African Republic (no tae be ramfeeselt wi the Republic o Sooth Africae), an independent Boer republic. The leadership o the Sooth African republic includit Paul Kruger. Nelspruit an the surroondin aurie an aa contain San airt.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: In October 2009, the ceety wis offeecially renamed Mbombela bi the Sooth African govrenment, the same name as the local municipality o which it is pairt. The ceety wis referred tae as "Nelspruit" for the purposes o the 2010 FIFA Warld Cup, an aw road signs still caw the ceety Nelspruit. Residents hae three years tae adopt Mbombela on signs an billboards.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: The ceety haes twa airports, Kruger Mpumalanga Internaitional Airport tae the northeast, an the general aviation Nelspruit Airport tae the soothwast. Kruger Mpumalanga is uised for scheduled flichts tae Johannesburg an, less frequently, tae Cape Toun an ither ceeties. It is an aa hame tae the Govrenment Research Institute for Citrus an Subtropical Fruits, an the Lowveld Botanical Gardens. The Nelspruit airport tae the Sooth Wast on the Kaapschehoop road is mainly uised bi private planes an chairter companies. It haes its awn touer but is controlled frae the KMI Airport.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Nelspruit is a major stopower pynt for tourists travellin tae the Kruger Naitional Pairk an tae Mozambique. Tourists frae Mozambique an aa stimulate the economy o the ceety significantly. Mony fowk frae Mozambique an Swaziland traivel tae Nelspruit for thair monthly grocery shoppin. Nelspruit is hame tae Emnotweni Casino situatit on the wey tae Whiteriver.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: A new fitbaa stadium wis biggit in Nelspruit for the 2010 FIFA Warld Cup. Finisht in November 2009, it wis named Mbombela Stadium an haes a capacity o 45,000. 1.05 billion rand wis spent on the construction o the stadium which hostit fower 2010 FIFA Warld Cup matches.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: LiGwalagwala FM is the lairgest SABC awned an fundit radio station in the ceety an the Mpumalanga Province. Mpower Fm, an independent Inglis commercial radio station broadcasts frae Nelspruit tae the province o Mpumalanga, an the local Afrikaans radio station cawed "Radio Laeveld 100.5fm"  broadcasts tae the Lowveld aurie an aa frae Nelspruit.
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: Nelspruit features a humid subtropical climate wi mild winters an warm simmers. Housomeivver, due tae the altitude, simmers are no quite as het as ane micht expect. Summers are warm an somewha humid, complete wi precipitation. Winters in the ceety are dry, wi relatively warm temperatures durin the day an chilly temperatures at nicht.

lines.value: Lincoln MacCauley Alexander, (21 Januar 1922 – 19 October 2012), served as the [[Leet o lieutenant govrenors o Ontario#Lieutenant Govrenors o Ontario, 1867-present|24t]] Lieutenant Govrenor o Ontario, Canadae frae 1985 tae 1991. Alexander wis an aa a Govrenor o the Canadian Unity Cooncil. Born in Toronto, Ontario, tae Wast Indian immigrants, Lincoln Alexander first distinguisht hissel in the Ryal Canadian Air Force durin the Seicont Warld War. He graduatit fae Osgoode Hall Law School in Toronto in 1953. In 1968, he wis electit tae the Canadian Hoose o Commons as the Hamilton Wast representative for the Progressive Conservative Pairty o Canadae, becomin Canadae's first black Member o Pairlament. He held the seat for fower successive elections.
